pageDescription1: Tailor lab is Tailor's venture builder. Our development team suffers from a serious illness, the diagnosis says that it is 'Ideitis', and we don't stop having ideas. Many of them can be implemented in our clients' projects. There are many others that are totally independent, and we didn't want to put them away.
pageDescription2: For this reason we create our own lab, a space where we shape and make live our own ideas. The objective is that all these ideas become real, totally independent projects, thanks to this they can even change ownership
pageDescription3: Not only do we digitize our ideas, but yours as well.
pageDescription4: Do we fly together? Letâ€™s fly far away.
